name: Tenable.sc
description: This app integrates with Tenable's SecurityCenter to provide endpoint-based investigative actions

retry_count.description: Maximum attempts to retry api call if database locked errors (Default: 5)

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity
Runs a scan against a specified IP or host

scan_policy_id.description: Tenable.sc Scan Policy ID to use

actions.description: Query Tenable.sc for a list of vulnerabilities associated with an IP or host name or CVEID
actions.verbose: If the input IP / host name / CVEID is not available in the server, Action will pass with 0 vulnerability.

ip_hostname.description: IP / host name of host to query

actions.description: Lists the scan policies available in Tenable.sc
Lists the repositories available in Tenable.sc
Update existing asset with provided fields or create a new one as a 'static' type
actions.verbose: View Tenable.sc API docs for available fields to update.

update_fields.description: Fields to use for updating the asset (JSON String)

actions.description: Update existing group with provided fields
actions.verbose: View Tenable.sc API docs for available fields to update.

update_fields.description: Fields to use for updating the group (JSON String)

example_values: All defining ranges of the Group in whose context this Asset is being evaluated.

actions.description: Lists the credentials available in Tenable.sc
actions.verbose: This action result does not contain any sensitive information like password.
